definition: to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline

sentences.english: I"d like to express my gratitude."
And so I am very grateful for his service.
sentences.chinese: 因此我對他的工作倍感謝忱。

sentences.english: Therefore, we will make a contribution to The Rotary Foundation as our expression of thanks.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我們將對扶輪基金會捐獻，以聊表謝忱。

sentences.english: In this, the whole earth human society to you all the earth person deeply thanks.
sentences.chinese: 在此，全地球人類社會所有地球人向您深表謝忱。

sentences.english: I'd like to express my gratitude.
sentences.chinese: 我要表達我的謝忱感謝。

sentences.english: And finally I want to express our deep appreciation to our Chinese hosts.
sentences.chinese: 最後，我希望對我們的中國東道主表示誠摯的謝忱。

sentences.english: I have known it, I have been most anxious to acknowledge to you how gratefully I feel it.
sentences.chinese: 我自從知道了這件事以後，一直就想對你表示謝忱。

sentences.english: Show decent thanks for the feeding of passengers.
sentences.chinese: 優雅地表達對遊客賜食的謝忱。

sentences.english: And finally, I want to express our deep appreciation to our Chinese hosts.
sentences.chinese: 末了，我志願對我們的中國東道主表示誠摯的謝忱。

sentences.english: I am grateful for his service.
sentences.chinese: 我對他的工作倍感謝忱。

sentences.english: Ever since I have known it, I have been most anxious to acknowledge to you how gratefully I feel it.
sentences.chinese: 我自從知道了這件事以後，一直就想對你表示謝忱。

sentences.english: The writer wishes to express his appreciation for the aid received.
sentences.chinese: 作者對於受到的幫助謹致謝忱。

sentences.english: If you will thank me, let it be for yourself alone.
sentences.chinese: 如果你當真要謝我，你只消表明你自己的謝忱。

sentences.english: In this, the whole earth human society deeply thanks to you.
sentences.chinese: 在此，全地球人類社會向您深表謝忱。
